last_post.content:
Look at the rise and fall of #BeReal!

This is why centralization of social media is such a bad idea.

BeReal is but one node. If it cannot sustain critical mass, it crashes and burns.

Meanwhile, every node that operates on the Fediverse *shares* the network effect!

No one company, institution, or service owns the ActivityPub protocol.
